acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

addSupportedCollateralTokens((address,by.details: For each token, maps it to its Pendle market and approves max spending to flash leverage core

params.tokensConfig: Array of token configurations including swap and market parameters.

params.flashLeverageCore: Address of the flash leverage contract
params.pendleRouter: Address of the Pendle router contract

returns._0: yield The yield generated in loan token terms with 18 decimals, returns 0 if position is at a loss
treasury The address of the current treasury

params.leverageParams: Parameters for the flash leverage operation
params.onBehalfOf: Address to open the position on behalf of

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Intentionally disabled to retain upgradeability and integration support management

params.onBehalfOf: Address to open the position on behalf of

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

unleverage(uint256,address,address,(uint.details: Calculates yield and deducts 5% fee on positive yields before returning funds to user

params.limitOrderData: Limit order parameters for the swap.
params.pendleSwap: Address of the Pendle swap contract to use.
params.positionId: The ID of the position to close.
params.swapData: Additional swap data required by Pendle.
params.tokenRedeemSy: Address of the token to redeem from SY (Standardized Yield) tokens

updateTreasury(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner. Validates that the new treasury is not zero address.

addSupportedCollateralTokens((address,by.notice: Allows owner to add support for new collateral tokens.

constructor.notice: Initializes the wrapper with required contract addresses

getPositionYieldInLoanToken(address,uint.notice: Calculates the yield generated on a specific position

getUserLeveragePosition(address,uint256).notice: Returns a specific leverage position for a user.

getUserLeveragePositions(address).notice: Returns all leverage positions for a specific user.

i_flashLeverageCore().notice: Flash leverage contract for executing leveraged positions

i_pendleRouter().notice: Pendle router for executing token swaps

renounceOwnership().notice: Overrides renounceOwnership to prevent ownership renunciation
